ing: 1/4 cup cherries, pitted and chopped, or to taste
2 tablespoons vanilla yogurt, or more to taste
des: "I love it. It is my made-up/own recipe. For more of a fruity taste, add fruit ice cream to the blender."
ins: Blend milk, pineapple, apple, pear, strawberries, cherries, and yogurt together in a blender until smooth, about 4 minutes.
